column4: Paddy_EIRE I've got an old Matrox card. 3d accelleration worked with a bootable games cd, but not with ubuntu
Did installing the driver help any bit?
Paddy_EIRE: I guess I'll just wait for the ATI Radeon 9300? Although I've heard Beryl/Compiz Fusion doesn't support ATI very well.
I installed what I could find. I'm starting to forget exactly what though
